00032 typedef struct {
00033    int address;
00034    int polarity[16];
00035 } LRS1445A_SETTINGS;
00036 
00037 #define LRS1445A_SETTINGS_STR "\
00038 Address = INT : 1\n\
00039 Polarity = INT[16] :\n\
00040 [0] -1\n\
00041 [1] -1\n\
00042 [2] -1\n\
00043 [3] -1\n\
00044 [4] -1\n\
00045 [5] -1\n\
00046 [6] -1\n\
00047 [7] -1\n\
00048 [8] -1\n\
00049 [9] -1\n\
00050 [10] -1\n\
00051 [11] -1\n\
00052 [12] -1\n\
00053 [13] -1\n\
00054 [14] -1\n\
00055 "
00056 
00057 typedef struct {
00058    LRS1445A_SETTINGS settings;
00059    int num_channels;
00060     INT(*bd) (INT cmd, ...);    /* bus driver entry function */
00061    void *bd_info;               /* private info of bus driver */
00062 } LRS1445A_INFO;
00063 
00064 /*---- device driver routines --------------------------------------*/
00065 
00066 void lrs1445a_switch(LRS1445A_INFO * info)
00067 {
00068    static INT last_address = -1;
00069    char str[80];
00070    INT status;
00071 
00072    if (info->settings.address != last_address) {
00073       BD_PUTS("MAINFRAME 15\r\n");
00074       BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "MAINFRAME 15\r\n", 1000);
00075       sprintf(str, "MAINFRAME %02d\r\n", info->settings.address);
00076       BD_PUTS(str);
00077       status = BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "> ", 2000);
00078       if (!status) {
00079          cm_msg(MERROR, "lrs1445a_init",
00080                 "LRS1445A adr %d doesn't respond. Check power and RS232 connection.",
00081                 info->settings.address);
00082          return;
00083       }
00084 
00085       last_address = info->settings.address;
00086    }
00087 }
00088 
00089 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00090 
00091 INT lrs1445a_init(HNDLE hkey, void **pinfo, INT channels, INT(*bd) (INT cmd, ...))
00092 {
00093    int status, size;
00094    char str[1000];
00095    HNDLE hDB, hkeydd;
00096    LRS1445A_INFO *info;
00097 
00098    /* allocate info structure */
00099    info = calloc(1, sizeof(LRS1445A_INFO));
00100    *pinfo = info;
00101 
00102    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00103 
00104    /* create LRS1445A settings record */
00105    status = db_create_record(hDB, hkey, "DD", LRS1445A_SETTINGS_STR);
00106    if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
00107       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00108 
00109    db_find_key(hDB, hkey, "DD", &hkeydd);
00110    size = sizeof(info->settings);
00111    db_get_record(hDB, hkeydd, &info->settings, &size, 0);
00112 
00113    info->num_channels = channels;
00114    info->bd = bd;
00115 
00116    /* initialize bus driver */
00117    if (!bd)
00118       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00119 
00120    status = bd(CMD_INIT, hkey, &info->bd_info);
00121 
00122    if (status != SUCCESS) {
00123       cm_msg(MERROR, "lrs1445a_init",
00124              "Cannot access RS232 port. Mayb other application is using it.");
00125       return status;
00126    }
00127 
00128    bd(CMD_DEBUG, FALSE);
00129 
00130    /* check if module is living  */
00131    sprintf(str, "MAINFRAME %02d\r\n", info->settings.address);
00132    BD_PUTS(str);
00133    status = BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "> ", 3000);
00134    if (!status) {
00135       cm_msg(MERROR, "lrs1445a_init",
00136              "LRS1445A adr %d doesn't respond. Check power and RS232 connection.",
00137              info->settings.address);
00138       return FE_ERR_HW;
00139    }
00140 
00141    /* check if HV enabled */
00142    BD_PUTS("SHOW STATUS\r");
00143    BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "> ", 3000);
00144 
00145    if (strstr(str, "disabled")) {
00146       cm_msg(MERROR, "lrs1445a_init",
00147              "LeCroy1440 adr %d: HV disabled by front panel button",
00148              info->settings.address);
00149 //    return FE_ERR_HW;
00150    }
00151 
00152    /* turn on HV main switch */
00153    BD_PUTS("ON\r");
00154    BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "> ", 5000);
00155 
00156    return FE_SUCCESS;
00157 }

00160 
00161 INT lrs1445a_exit(LRS1445A_INFO * info)
00162 {
00163    info->bd(CMD_EXIT, info->bd_info);
00164 
00165    free(info);
00166 
00167    return FE_SUCCESS;
00168 }

00170 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00171 
00172 INT lrs1445a_set(LRS1445A_INFO * info, INT channel, float value)
00173 {
00174    char str[80];
00175 
00176    lrs1445a_switch(info);
00177 
00178    sprintf(str, "WRITE (%d,%d) %04.0f\r", channel / 16, channel % 16,
00179            info->settings.polarity[channel / 16] * value);
00180 
00181    BD_PUTS(str);
00182    BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "> ", 1000);
00183 
00184    return FE_SUCCESS;
00185 }
00186 
00187 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00188 
00189 INT lrs1445a_set_all(LRS1445A_INFO * info, INT channels, float *pvalue)
00190 {
00191    char str[1000];
00192    INT i, j, n;
00193 
00194    lrs1445a_switch(info);
00195 
00196    for (i = 0; i < (channels - 1) / 16 + 1; i++) {
00197       n = channels - i * 16 - 1;
00198       if (n > 7)
00199          n = 7;
00200       sprintf(str, "WRITE (%d,0-%d) ", i, n);
00201 
00202       for (j = 0; j < channels && j < 8; j++) {
00203          if (i * 16 + j == channels)
00204             break;
00205 
00206          sprintf(str + strlen(str), "%1.1f,", *pvalue++ * info->settings.polarity[i]);
00207       }
00208       sprintf(str + strlen(str), "\r");
00209 
00210       BD_PUTS(str);
00211       BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "> ", 3000);
00212 
00213       n = channels - i * 16 - 1;
00214       if (n > 15)
00215          n = 15;
00216       sprintf(str, "WRITE (%d,8-%d) ", i, n);
00217 
00218       for (j = 8; j < channels && j < 16; j++) {
00219          if (i * 16 + j == channels)
00220             break;
00221 
00222          sprintf(str + strlen(str), "%1.1f,", *pvalue++ * info->settings.polarity[i]);
00223       }
00224       sprintf(str + strlen(str), "\r");
00225 
00226       BD_PUTS(str);
00227       BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "> ", 3000);
00228    }
00229 
00230    return FE_SUCCESS;
00231 }
00232 
00233 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00234 
00235 INT lrs1445a_get(LRS1445A_INFO * info, INT channel, float *pvalue)
00236 {
00237    double value;
00238    char *p, str[256];
00239 
00240    lrs1445a_switch(info);
00241 
00242    sprintf(str, "READ (%d,%d)\r", channel / 16, channel % 16);
00243    BD_PUTS(str);
00244    BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "> ", 1000);
00245    p = str + 77;
00246 
00247    if (channel % 16 > 9)
00248       p++;
00249    if (channel / 16 > 9)
00250       p++;
00251 
00252    sscanf(p, "%lf", &value);
00253 
00254    *pvalue = (float) value;
00255 
00256    return FE_SUCCESS;
00257 }
00258 
00259 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00260 
00261 INT lrs1445a_get_all(LRS1445A_INFO * info, INT channels, float *array)
00262 {
00263    int i, j;
00264    double value;
00265    char str[256];
00266 
00267    lrs1445a_switch(info);
00268 
00269    for (i = 0; i <= (channels - 1) / 16; i++) {
00270       sprintf(str, "READ (%d,0-15)\r", i);
00271       BD_PUTS(str);
00272       BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "Current\r\n", 5000);
00273 
00274       for (j = 0; j < 16 && i * 8 + j < channels; j++) {
00275          BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "\r\n", 5000);
00276          sscanf(str + 23, "%lf", &value);
00277          array[i * 8 + j] = (float) value;
00278       }
00279    }
00280    BD_GETS(str, sizeof(str), "> ", 2000);
00281 
00282    return FE_SUCCESS;
00283 }

00286 
00287 INT lrs1445a_set_current_limit(LRS1445A_INFO * info, float limit)
00288 {
00289    lrs1445a_switch(info);
00290 
00291    if (limit > 2550)
00292       limit = 2550.f;
00293 
00294    /* command SET CURRENT LIMIT does not work ??? */
00295 
00296    return FE_SUCCESS;
00297 }
00298 
00299 /*---- device driver entry point -----------------------------------*/
00300 
00301 INT lrs1445a(INT cmd, ...)
00302 {
00303    va_list argptr;
00304    HNDLE hKey;
00305    INT channel, status;
00306    float value, *pvalue;
00307    void *info, *bd;
00308    DWORD flags;
00309 
00310    va_start(argptr, cmd);
00311    status = FE_SUCCESS;
00312 
00313    switch (cmd) {
00314    case CMD_INIT:
00315       hKey = va_arg(argptr, HNDLE);
00316       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00317       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00318       flags = va_arg(argptr, DWORD);
00319       bd = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00320       status = lrs1445a_init(hKey, info, channel, bd);
00321       break;
00322 
00323    case CMD_EXIT:
00324       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00325       status = lrs1445a_exit(info);
00326       break;
00327 
00328    case CMD_SET:
00329       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00330       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00331       value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
00332       status = lrs1445a_set(info, channel, value);
00333       break;
00334 
00335    case CMD_SET_ALL:
00336       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00337       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00338       pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00339       status = lrs1445a_set_all(info, channel, pvalue);
00340       break;
00341 
00342    case CMD_GET:
00343       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00344       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00345       pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00346       status = lrs1445a_get(info, channel, pvalue);
00347       break;
00348 
00349    case CMD_GET_ALL:
00350       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00351       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00352       pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00353       status = lrs1445a_get_all(info, channel, pvalue);
00354       break;
00355 
00356       /* current measurements not supported in LRS1445A */
00357 
00358    case CMD_GET_CURRENT:
00359       break;
00360 
00361    case CMD_GET_CURRENT_ALL:
00362       break;
00363 
00364    case CMD_SET_CURRENT_LIMIT:
00365       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00366       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00367       value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
00368       if (channel == 0)         /* one one limit for all channels */
00369          status = lrs1445a_set_current_limit(info, value);
00370       else
00371          status = FE_SUCCESS;
00372       break;
00373 
00374    case CMD_SET_CURRENT_LIMIT_ALL:
00375    case CMD_GET_DEFAULT_NAME:
00376    case CMD_SET_LABEL:
00377       break;
00378 
00379    default:
00380       cm_msg(MERROR, "lrs1445a device driver", "Received unknown command %d", cmd);
00381       status = FE_ERR_DRIVER;
00382       break;
00383    }
00384 
00385    va_end(argptr);
00386 
00387    return status;
00388 }
